sections.title: AI Apps Monetization
sections.description: Insights on the growth and challenges of AI applications in the market.

key_points.point: AI apps face challenges in sustaining growth due to rapid obsolescence.
key_points.evidence: Voice note discussing the risk of AI apps becoming obsolete quickly.

sections.title: AI Ad Networks
sections.description: Exploration of AI-driven ad networks and their market implications.

key_points.point: Meta's AI ad network faces resistance from brand teams.
key_points.evidence: Issues with brand teams not wanting generative output.

sections.title: Landing Page Optimization
sections.description: Technical discussions on optimizing landing pages using CRM tools.

key_points.point: Braze supports native landing page creation but sees a gap in customer needs.
key_points.evidence: Braze team discussed landing page + CRM integration.
